r_mag_comment: Initial guess for the major radius of the magnetic axis, in meters.
steps_comment: Array with coil currents for each simulation step. NSFsim interpolates signal values between steps and holds them constant after the last provided step.
z_mag_comment: Initial guess for the vertical position of the magnetic axis, in meters.
center_comment: Initial guess for the major radius of the plasma geometric center, in meters.
general_comment: This is the default JSON for the NSFsim DIII-D 2024 magnetic equilibrium simulation with full stabilization. It is based on the parameters of DIII-D discharge 182626. For more details, see https://fusiontwin.io/help/twins/sims.
t_e_axis_comment: Electron temperature at the axis, in eV.
t_i_axis_comment: Ion temperature at the axis, in eV.
grid_coef_comment: Grid homogeneity coefficient (between 1e-5 and 1): 1 - homogeneous, <1 - tighter towards the edge.
steps_num_comment: Number of simulated steps: each step is a set of currents (I) in Amperes for ecoilA, ecoilB, F1-9A, F1-9B coils.
t_e_bndry_comment: Electron temperature at the boundary, in eV.
t_i_bndry_comment: Ion temperature at the boundary, in eV.
param_mode_comment: Parameter mode: 1 - default (recommended), 6 - provide profiles for PPRIME (via plasma_pressure_derivative below) and FFPRIME (via plasma_current_derivative below)
control_mode_comment: The control mode defines what is used as a control signal (see steps/signals below): 0 - Coil currents | 1 - Coil voltages | 2 - Coil currents but some coils are passive (see passive_coils below).
density_mode_comment: Density mode: 0 - electron density evolves, 1 - average electron density is fixed at the first step.
kinetics_mode_comment: The density and temperature profiles are calculated in the first step based on the t_e_* and t_i_* parameters above. Further calculations depend on the selected kinetics mode: 0 - All profiles are fixed | 1 - The electron density profile is fixed, and the temperature profiles are calculated | 2 - The electron density profile is calculated, and the temperature profiles are fixed | 3 - All profiles are calculated.
passive_coils_comment: Indices of coils that are passive.
r_control_ref_comment: Reference major radius for the control coils, in centimeters.
z_control_ref_comment: Reference vertical position for the control coils, in centimeters.
ip_fixed_steps_comment: Number of initial simulation steps with fixed plasma current.
r_control_coils_comment: Control coils for the horizontal position.
z_control_coils_comment: Control coils for the vertical position.
vertical_stability_mode_comment: Vertical stability mode: 1 - no stabilization | 3 - vertical and horizontal stabilization | 6 - vertical stabilization. For 3 and 6, use r_control_coils and z_control_coils below.
